name: Robot Ringmaster
description:
The kind folks from Clowns of Steel present a fantastical, interactive presentation of the nature of electronical automata and their applications...

ROBOT RINGMASTER

Welcome, ladies and gentlemen, to P.C. Barnum's robot circus! Take your place as the ringmaster of a fully-automatic show and try your best to switch between the three rings in order to prevent any of your acts from going south! 

A submission for Texas Game Jam 2021.

Highest Dev Score: $4285.66
Lowest Dev Score: $14.05

Controls
  • Space: switch between events
  • AD/left and right arrow keys: control the robot in the selected event
Credits
  • Noah Kuhn  (@_noah_kuhn_, Soundcloud: noahnoahnoahnoahnoahnoah): Programming and Music
  • Alex Hanlin (@gluethulhu): Programming and Animation
  • Jasmine Hanlin (Insta: jumblebee.art, YT: Jumblebee): Art
  • Rodrigo Okamoto: Programming
  • Sound effects from freesound.org
